files.patch:
@@ -640,0 +640,5 @@
+  log_trace(safepoint)("Polling page exception: thread = " INTPTR_FORMAT ", pc = "
+                       INTPTR_FORMAT " (%s), stub = " INTPTR_FORMAT,
+                       p2i(Thread::current()), p2i(pc),
+                       at_poll_return ? "return" : "loop",
+                       p2i(stub));
